column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday March 9 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Ave of Champions:
column4: Monday 3/9 at 6 a.m. (approximate) thru Friday 3/27.  Closure will be in effect 24 hrs/day.

column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Ave of Champions:
column4: The lane from S Limestone toward S MLK will be CLOSED for major sewer line work.  Traffic on Limestone will be detoured to E Maxwell St.

column3: Upcoming Closure Scheduled for Ave of Champions:
column4: The lanes from S MLK toward S Limestone will remain open with traffic flowing one-way only.
